Description: Adds a row to an excel file with information of the monte carlo run
Always generated. All monte carlo raw results.
Always generated. Statistical results per model.
Always generated. A full detailed description of each model to be trained.
Generates a confusion matrix file per model
Generates a user friendly monte carlo text summary
Prints progress bar per model epoch
Creates the `run_data.csv` as data is obtained not to lose information if an unexpected exit happens.
This is generated if a test_data is passed to the :meth:`run()` method of MonteCarlo.
